name: Just Drive
description:
Love racing games ? Don't like complex gameplay ? Have some time to waste ?

"Turn on your old tv, connect your old console and just drive!"




You like creating 3D content and modding games ?

  • Create a track in your 3D software of choice
  • Setup the track in Godot engine and export as a package
  • Add it to the mods folder
  • Enjoy your creation or share with friends and challenge them to beat your record
  • Complete tutorials at http://www.vencious.com

Game features

  • Just a sweet time waster
  • No complex gameplay
  • Play with a Keyboard or a Gamepad
  • Retro look
  • Time attack mode
  • Score attack mode
  • No saves and loads
  • it's all about getting higher in leaderboards
  • 15+ cars
  • All cars unlocked
  • Realistic physics
  • Play on custom made maps
